meanings.definition: Able to adhere or stick to a surface.
meanings.sent1: The sticky notes are very stickable on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The glue is so stickable that it holds things together well.
meanings.sent3: The stickable tape got stuck to my fingers and made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as stickable as super glue.
meanings.sent5: The stickable label stayed on the package even in the rain.

meanings.definition: Capable of being attached or affixed.
meanings.sent1: The stickable hook held the keys securely by the door.
meanings.sent2: The stickable Velcro made it easy to fasten the shoes.
meanings.sent3: The stickable magnets on the fridge kept rearranging themselves.
meanings.sent4: His loyalty was as stickable as a magnet to steel.
meanings.sent5: The stickable sticker stayed on the laptop for years without peeling off.

meanings.sent1: The stickable paper was perfect for making crafts.
meanings.sent2: The stickable material made it easy to patch up the hole.
meanings.sent3: The stickable bandage had cute designs to make you smile.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was as stickable as a smile that brightens a room.
meanings.sent5: The stickable stamp left a clear mark on the envelope.
